title: MAG 187 - Checking Out Transcript-converted
text:
rwhelming now, to be honest. Ah, 
more of a journey of gentle self-discovery, really. I-I didn’t realise I’m quite so… 
argumentative. 
ARCHIVIST 
I mean… 
MARTIN 
Y-Y-You don’t need to comment. 
ARCHIVIST 
Alright. 
MARTIN 
…So… 
Helen’s gone, then? 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 187 – Checking Out 
 
35 
ARCHIVIST 
Yeah. 
[A footstep on debris as Martin considers] 
MARTIN 
Damn. 
ARCHIVIST 
Yeah. 
MARTIN 
Time to mourn? 
ARCHIVIST 
You can if you want. 
(Beat) 
Do you? Want to mourn? 
MARTIN 
…A bit, I guess. I-I mean, she was our friend. Sort of. A bit. Until you killed her. 
Which I’m sure you had to do. 
ARCHIVIST 
Take some time if you need. But not too long. 
[A few footsteps on debris] 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 187 – Checking Out 
 
36 
MARTIN 
Why the sudden rush? 
ARCHIVIST 
You see that over there? 
[Footstep] 
MARTIN 
Yeah? 
ARCHIVIST 
That’s London. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS

Archivist, Alexander J Newall as Martin Blackwood, Imogen Harris as Helen, 
and Jenny Haufek as The Guest. To subscribe, buy merchandise, or join our
